text: @SecPompeo Stop your groundless accusation, admit your failure in containing the coronavirus in the US, and start right now to save the lives of American people! For God's sake, what are you f**** doing? Oh, I forgot. You've been trained to do it all day. https://t.co/uZlgLgjerE
